title: Refrigerator, Bike Storage (coming soon!), Pool
posting_body: ['Location Location Location!Welcome home to Millennium Apartments!', ' Open the door to a better way of living!', 'At Millennium Apartments, we believe an apartment is more than just a place to eat and sleep.', 'Your apartment should inspire you, refresh you, and offer a welcome refuge from the hustle and bustle of daily life.', 'Millennium Apartments is located right in the heart of vibrant Studio City, just walking distance from Universal Studios and The Radford Studios.', "You'll never know which celebrity you might run into on a daily basis.", 'We welcome you to stop by to view our wonderful community!', 'Professionally Managed by Cirrus Asset Management, Inc., CA - License # 01834798', '-Laundry Room', '-Courtyard/ Relaxation Area', '-Efficient Appliances', '-Gated Community', '-Availability 24 Hours', '-Walking Distance to Public Schools', '-Spanish Speaking Staff', '-On-Site Maintenance', '-Refrigerator', '-Cable Ready', '-Close to Public Transportation', '-Disposal', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Pricing and availability are subject to change.']
